body_text: What is the formal term for energy in Dragon Ball Z? In Bleach, the term is "reiatsu". In Naruto, it is "chakra". However, all I ever really heard in DBZ is "power level". Is there a more formal descriptive term for the source of their powers or the energy they give off?
Is Haki based on anything real? In One Piece series, there's this 'will' technique called Haki. Is this based on anything real, all three of them?
